nodes.name: Halifax, Nova Scotia
nodes.description: Atlantic salt air, fog horns, and a van full of possibility.

nodes.name: Wood Islands Ferry
nodes.description: Seagulls orbit as you queue for the crossing to the island red soils.

nodes.name: Fundy Tidal Flats
nodes.description: Bay of Fundy tides expose a vast mud plain dotted with driftwood.

nodes.name: Fredericton
nodes.description: Victorian brick, river fog, and a gas station with questionable coffee.

nodes.name: Montréal
nodes.description: Neon bagel signs blur past as traffic merges toward the island core.

nodes.name: Ottawa
nodes.description: Parliament Hill glitters across the river; the van idles dutifully.

nodes.name: Sault Ste. Marie
nodes.description: Lake Superior spray clings to the van as you chart a northern route.

nodes.name: Winnipeg
nodes.description: Prairie winds buffet the Forks; the crew scavenges bannock and jokes.

nodes.name: Churchill
nodes.description: The Hudson Bay line ends with polar bear warnings and aurora forecasts.

nodes.name: Regina
nodes.description: Big sky meets prairie grain elevators and a rest stop with perogies.

nodes.name: Calgary
nodes.description: Cowtown towers reflect the Rockies looming to the west.

nodes.name: Edmonton
nodes.description: Festival banners and river valley trails tempt a longer stay.

nodes.name: Yellowknife
nodes.description: Permafrost roads and northern lights test the van's heater.

nodes.name: Banff
nodes.description: Glacier melt streams shimmer beside the Trans-Canada through the Rockies.

nodes.name: Kamloops
nodes.description: Desert hills roll past as you hunt for a ranch-style motel.

nodes.name: Vancouver
nodes.description: Rain-slick streets lead to the Pacific, cedar and salt in the air.
